name: After School Girlfriend
summary:
It’s a new year at Souin High, and you’re passing the time the only way you know how—hiding away at the back of the class.

However, when you’re asked to help improve a simple poster, your perfect plans for a quiet high school life are dashed as you’re appointed campaign manager for the most unlikely student council president in the whole school…

After a disastrous start to the campaign, can you gain the support of the rest of the student body, or are you destined to sit on the sidelines forever?
